scripts.build: mkdir ../server/static; export NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' && npm run build_component && npm run build_app
scripts.build_component: cd packages/adp-chat-component && npm run build && cd ../../../server/static && rm -rf adp-chat-component && cp -r ../../client/packages/adp-chat-component/dist adp-chat-component
scripts.build_app: cd packages/app && npm run build && cd ../../../server/static && rm -rf app && cp -r ../../client/packages/app/dist app
scripts.build_app0: cd packages/app0 && npm run build && cd ../../../server/static && rm -rf app && cp -r ../../client/packages/app0/dist app
